algorithm.name: DLIB
algorithm.description: Detects faces in images and videos using the dlib library.

properties.name: MIN_DETECTION_CONFIDENCE
properties.description: This is the minimum dlib object detection confidence needed to start a new track.

properties.name: MIN_TRACK_OBJECT_SIMILARITY_VALUE
properties.description: The minimum amount of similarity required by a detection to be matched with an existing track.

properties.name: MIN_UPDATE_CORRELATION
properties.description: The minimum amount of correlation between frames needed to continue tracking.

properties.name: VERBOSE
properties.description: VERBOSE = 0: no debugging output and VERBOSE = 1: print settings and detection results.

actions.name: DLIB FACE DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the dlib face detection algorithm using the default parameters.

pipelines.name: DLIB FACE DETECTION (WITH MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs dlib face detection and marks up the results.

pipelines.name: DLIB FACE DETECTION (WITH MOG MOTION PREPROCESSOR) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs MOG motion preprocessing and dlib face detection.

pipelines.name: DLIB FACE DETECTION (WITH SUBSENSE MOTION PREPROCESSOR) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs SuBSENSE motion preprocessing and dlib face detection.

pipelines.name: DLIB FACE DETECTION (WITH MOG MOTION PREPROCESSOR AND MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs MOG motion preprocessing, dlib face detection, and markup.

pipelines.name: DLIB FACE DETECTION (WITH SUBSENSE MOTION PREPROCESSOR AND MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs SuBSENSE motion preprocessing, dlib face detection, and markup.
